Heading: Location
Value:
Midlands region of England. Later moved to Chalk River, Ontario, and later to Scarborough Bluffs east of 
downtown Toronto. At time of arrest, he was living in Tweed, Ontario, and also had a house in Ottawa.

Heading: Parent’s marital status
Value: Divorced (Stepfather married his mother soon after)
